@libbyanelson @jimwaterson When I interned at WH, I once spent 30 min w/ a prominent CEO heading to a sit room meeting outside gate. SOP.
@JAClark_13 No k-12 laws recently passed (FERPA-like previous laws). Many laws will be intro'd this yr, though
@PlayWell_LLC @mvendituoli @elanazeide @usedgov Interesting! Would love to read history behind that addition. Doubt most fam attorneys know.
@PlayWell_LLC @elanazeide Yes, exactly. I'd be interested in seeing those.
@PlayWell_LLC @elanazeide Yes. Cld see this going bad very quickly
@PlayWell_LLC @elanazeide And if court agrees parent shldnt hv custody, wldnt that carry to FERPA rights?
@PlayWell_LLC @elanazeide Agreed, it sounds (from article) that courts wld hv to explicitly end FERPA rights whn they take away custody
@PlayWell_LLC Really interesting. Not sure I agree with @usedgov's interpretation here. @elanazeide, what do you think?

.@HiddenFigures incredible & inspiring. The arc of the moral universe bends toward justice if we keep speaking & learning & doing. See it.
Big problem: how tech vs policymaker vs consumer etc defines privacy terms can vary to legal detriment- @JulesPolonetsky #privacypapers
.@futureofprivacy launching research coordinating network, via @NSF grant, to create more cross-disciplinary pubs on privacy #privacypapers
#privacypapers discussion doesn't end tonight: @futureofprivacy distributing to US & EU policymakers - @JulesPolonetsky
If don't know sensitive attribute, may hv proxy data point that discriminates accidentally, & can't fix -@realjoshkroll #privacypapers
Excluding sensitive attributes from data put into algorithm in attempt to minimize bias tends to actually increase unfairness #privacypapers
Easier to track decisions made by a rule - algorithm - than it is to track & evaluate a human decision -@realjoshkroll #privacypapers
Just bc algorithm driven by math doesn't mean impartial & not subject to challenge - @realjoshkroll #privacypapers
Using methods in our paper wld make it easier for aggrieved consumer to challenge automated decisions -@jreidenberg #privacypapers
Existing standards for algorithms make very hard for consumers to challenge automated decisions-@jreidenberg #privacypapers
Great audience Q: how can average consumer appeal an automated (algorithmic) decision? #privacypapers
Policymakers shld look where automated decisions hv significant impact on lives (ex/employment) -@jreidenberg #privacypapers
Ppl/govt/companies must be able to "show work" abt #algorithms as public commitment that is working as it shld @realjoshkroll #privacypapers
Policymakers must ask for verification that software is doing what it's supposed to be doing -@jreidenberg #privacypapers #algorithms
Next up: Accountable #Algorithms @privacypapers by @realjoshkroll & @jreidenberg https://t.co/GWhdUAgKwW
Ppl will project their privacy expectations on to any privacy notice, so researchers agree notices not useful - @KMac_Martin #privacypapers
Next study: when ppl are "in public" (real life or online), what are privacy feelings when data (re-/mis)used? @KMac_Martin #privacypapers
Next study: when ppl go "in public" (real life or online), what are their privacy feelings? @KMac_Martin #privacypapers
Ppl in study thought voting records almost impossible to get, when very easy -@KMac_Martin #privacypapers
Context matters: Ppl don't want to give blanket ok to use their data. Want to know who is asking & how will use-@KMac_Martin #privacypapers
Just bc something labeled public record, need to be careful how easy is to access & how will be used-@KMac_Martin #privacypapers
Younger respondents more likely to be upset abt their data being accessed thru data broker-@KMac_Martin #privacypapers
Respondents very nuanced abt how they want ppl to see/use their data -@KMac_Martin #privacypapers
Overwhelmingly ppl uncomfortable w data brokers disclosing their data when they dont mind if govt or others do-@KMac_Martin #privacypapers
Paper abt under what conditions ppl can access public records, & if matters who you get that #data from -@KMac_Martin #privacypapers
Privacy not binary, not just public OR private, bt abt who shld hv access & what can do w #data - @KMac_Martin #privacypapers
Next up, @HNissenbaum @KMac_Martin's paper on privacy of public #data, available here: https://t.co/QQDkp1xyyt #privacypapers
Very limited resources available to state AGs, so generally only bring actions when egregious -@daniellecitron #privacypapers
Both CA & DE AGs hv been leaders in protecting #studentprivacy - @daniellecitron #privacypapers
.@DanielSolove & @daniellecitron argue that anxiety shld be cognizable harm for data breaches-@daniellecitron #privacypapers
.@jammingecho brings up another winning #privacypapers by @daniellecitron abt risk & harm of #databreach https://t.co/iVQejkikPT
State AG voluntary compliance agreements often very weak w/ limited penalties, look to IA & MD for models -@daniellecitron #privacypapers
Natl #databreach standard been talked abt, bt fed bills often weaker than states. Fed laws shld be floor-@daniellecitron #privacypapers
States as "labs of democracy" often becomes competition, not the case w state AGs & privacy enforcement-@daniellecitron #privacypapers
Recently state AGs acting in multi-state capacity for enforcement actions,brings more attention to their role-@daniellecitron #privacypapers
Tons of original research by @daniellecitron on state AGs & privacy - @JammingEcono Read it here: https://t.co/ul12XN2i47 #privacypapers
State AGs often work together in creating privacy norms- @daniellecitron #privacypapers
Shld we preempt role of state AGs in privacy enforcement? I say no - @daniellecitron #privacypapers
State AGs hv also created new privacy areas like youth privacy, sexual privacy, etc-- @daniellecitron #privacypapers
State AGs hv been on cutting edge of consumer choice when it comes to privacy, restrictions abt data use, etc-@daniellecitron #privacypapers
State AGs hv been making privacy policy for long time, unsung heroes of #data privacy & security - @daniellecitron #privacypapers
Next up, @JammingEcono @daniellecitron discussing paper on role of state AGs on privacy. #privacypapers https://t.co/ul12XN2i47
In Microsoft-Ireland, if Microsoft had been given subpoena not warrant, case more clear cut - must turn over data-@jendaskal #privacypapers
Why worry abt giving foreigner US-held data to foreign govts? Worry less privacy if not subject to US standards -@jendaskal #privacypapers
Important allowing foreign govts to access US-held data abt their citizens be subject to certain due processes - @jendaskal #privacypapers
DOJ legislation proposed last June wld allow certain foreign govts to access US-held #data abt their citizens--@jendaskal #privacypapers
Microsoft-Ireland case was bad decision & Congress shld correct, allow US govt access to foreign servers -@jendaskal #privacypapers
Nowhere close to hving global harmonization abt foreign law enforcement access to data, bt hv to start somewhere-@jendaskal #privacypapers
US not amending law to facilitate foreign govt access to #data = more data localization (bad for privacy, economy)-@jendaskal #privacypapers
Problem: foreign govts hv to formally request access to #data from US if data is held by US company -@jendaskal #privacypapers
ECPA prohibits US providers from turning over #data to foreign govts, even if data belongs to foreign person - @jendaskal #privacypapers
Q is how far US law enforcement can reach outside its borders for #data - @jendaskal #privacypapers
Data is inherently not territorial - @jendaskal #privacypapers
Now live-tweeting at @futureofprivacy #privacypapers conference!

The more kids trained to be critical media consumers, the better prepared they will be to deal w extremist messages - @orensegal #fosi2016
Company moderation of extremist speech can keep others from having their speech chilled - @KevinBankston #fosi2016
Most transparency abt what/# of extremist posts companies take down is whn they're under pressure to take down more-@KevinBankston #fosi2016
THIS, especially when it comes to #studentprivacy! #fosi2016 https://t.co/rgwPE4hYb9
Problem UK has w/ far right extremist material vs ISIS extremism is line of what is agnst law isn't as defined -@metpoliceuk Birch #fosi2016
If going to censor extremist speech, companies must limit white extremism as much as Muslim extremism! -@KevinBankston #fosi2016
Law enforcement has limited tech knowledge - companies shld work with & help educate - @KevinBankston #fosi2016
Someone who is being victimized doesn't care abt free market of ideas/govt counter-narrative. They want to feel safe. @orensegal #fosi2016
See this article on that culture shift from my colleague - @KevinBankston #fosi2016 https://t.co/ZYMiQ35rGs https://t.co/MGtNGxUmaj
Shift towards social media platforms needing to censor more as extremism grows means must provide support thm -@KevinBankston #fosi2016
